verses.verse: Bel<WH1078> has bowed<WH3766> down,<WH3766> Nebo<WH9309> stoops<WH7164> over;<WH7164> Their images<WH6091> are [consigned] to the beasts<WH9130> and the cattle.<WH929> The things<WH5385> that you carry<WH5385> are burdensome,<WH6006> A load<WH4853> for the weary<WH5889> [beast.]

They stooped<WH7164> over,<WH7164> they have bowed<WH3766> down<WH3766> together;<WH9191> They could<WH3201> not rescue<WH4422> the burden,<WH4853> But have themselves<WH5315> gone<WH1980> into captivity.<WH7628>

"Listen<WH8085> to Me, O house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> And all<WH3605> the remnant<WH7611> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> You who have been borne<WH6006> by Me from birth,<WH990> And have been carried<WH5375> from the womb;<WH7358>

Even to your old<WH2209> age,<WH2209> I shall be the same,<WH1931> And even<WH5704> to your graying<WH7872> years<WH7872> I shall bear<WH5445> [you!] I have done<WH6213> [it,] and I shall carry<WH5375> [you;] And I shall bear<WH5445> [you,] and I shall deliver<WH4422> [you.]
"To whom<WH4310> would you liken<WH1819> Me, And make<WH9586> Me equal<WH9586> and compare<WH4911> Me, That we should be alike<WH1819>?

"Those who lavish<WH2107> gold<WH2091> from the purse<WH3599> And weigh<WH8254> silver<WH3701> on the scale<WH7070> Hire<WH7936> a goldsmith,<WH6884> and he makes<WH6213> it [into] a god;<WH410> They bow<WH5456> down,<WH5456> indeed<WH637> they worship<WH7812> it.

"They lift<WH5375> it upon the shoulder<WH3802> and carry<WH5445> it; They set<WH5117> it in its place<WH8478> and it stands<WH5975> [there.] It does not move<WH4185> from its place.<WH4725> Though<WH637> one may cry<WH6817> to it, it cannot<WH3808> answer;<WH6030> It cannot<WH3808> deliver<WH3467> him from his distress.<WH6869>
"Remember<WH2142> this,<WH384> and be assured;<WH9039> Recall<WH7725> it to mind,<WH3820> you transgressors.<WH6586>

"Remember<WH2142> the former<WH7223> things<WH7223> long<WH5769> past,<WH5769> For I am God,<WH410> and there<WH369> is no<WH369> other;<WH5750> [I am] God,<WH430> and there is no<WH657> one<WH657> like<WH3644> Me,

Declaring<WH5046> the end<WH319> from the beginning<WH7225> And from ancient<WH6924> times<WH6924> things which<WH834> have not been done,<WH6213> Saying,<WH559> 'My purpose<WH6098> will be established,<WH6965> And I will accomplish<WH6213> all<WH3605> My good<WH2656> pleasure<WH2656>';

Calling<WH7121> a bird<WH5861> of prey<WH5861> from the east,<WH4217> The man<WH376> of My purpose<WH6098> from a far<WH4801> country.<WH776> Truly<WH637> I have spoken;<WH1696> truly<WH637> I will bring<WH935> it to pass.<WH935> I have planned<WH3335> [it, surely] I will do<WH6213> it.
"Listen<WH8085> to Me, you stubborn-minded, Who are far<WH7350> from righteousness.<WH6666>

"I bring<WH7126> near<WH7126> My righteousness,<WH6666> it is not far<WH7368> off; And My salvation<WH8668> will not delay.<WH309> And I will grant<WH5414> salvation<WH8668> in Zion,<WH6726> [And] My glory<WH8597> for Israel.<WH3478>
